name: Monochromancy
description:
This is a puzzle platformer prototype I worked on with a team in 2017, the objective is to collect two keys and reach the end of the level to complete it, you can walk on white or black tiles, all other color will damage you reducing your health.

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, R to shoot, Q & E to rotate the camera.

Coding: Mohamed Elmejrab

Modelling and all 3D assets: Kusai Souff

Level Design: Kusai Souff & Mohamed Elshushan
